column3: Does it really work without the location markers? If yes, this is a neat change, asking myself, why we didn't do this earlier ;).\n

Well we had removed the locations at one time. But from the English
translation. Which made work harder for the translators. Removing it from
the pulled translations has no effect as they're only used for compilation.

Automatic sanity-testing: FAILED BUILD/TEST, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/3a54ad9abae1fab4e5caa42a2375850ffb88588d for binaries and test log.

This could happen for one of several reasons:
1. It chanages paths in makefile.linux-mingw or otherwise changes build scripts in a way that made them incompatible with the automated testing scripts (please tweak those patches in qa/pull-tes
